text:
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
2
Named by NAEB President Ausmus to direct the activities
of this newly created personnel service is Donald N. Walker,
formerly assistant office supervisor of the University of Illinois
Health Service, where his duties included personnel supervision,
Mr, Walker, a University of Illinois graduate, has also
had experience in sales, accounting and office management, as well
as operating his own printing business for three years. He is 27
years old, single, and makes his home in Urbana, Illinois,
##########
